user_query: I am organizing a company gathering and would like to offer a variety of pizzas to the attendees. Can you provide me with the details of the available pizzas, including their names, prices, and descriptions? Also, I need some dessert options with their names, prices, and descriptions. Moreover, I would like to know the nutritional information of the dishes with the UPC 4019300005154.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the list of available pizzas including their names, prices, and descriptions.
Retrieve the list of available desserts including their names, prices, and descriptions.
Get the nutritional information for the dish with the UPC 4019300005154.
